A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Why\, everything we loved about Star Wars has been ruined with money\, the story is lacking\, with many plot holes\, the characters are inconsiderate and unpredictable\, constantly making irrational decisions. Luke has been destroyed as a character. Any story arcs potentially set up by JJ Abrams has been erased\, resulting in a jumpy story. New\, exciting characters which had so much potential as side stories\, have been wasted. This is a total failure.
